3984.Condition: When there are 3 or more Super Saiyans category allies on the team  or When there are 3 or more Movie Heroes category allies on the team

Active Skill.Name: Spirit Bomb Super Saiyan
Active Skill.Description:
Massively raises ATK temporarily, 
causes ultimate damage to enemy and, 
within the turn activated, 
all attacks become critical hits
Active Skill.Condition: Starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle and When there are 3 or more Super Saiyans category allies on the same turn  or Starting from the 6th turn from the start of battle
